          <title>
            <string language="en">A comet's orbit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn eines Kometen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'orbite d'une comète</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita de um cometa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbita della cometa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τροχιά ενός κομήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órbita de un cometa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the orbit of a comet with respect to the orbits of some planets (left) and with respect to the Sun (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bahn eines Kometen in 
Bezug auf die Bahnen einiger Planeten (nach links) und in Bezug auf 
die Sonne (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'orbite d'une comète 
en ce qui concerne les orbites de quelques planètes (à gauche) et en
ce qui concerne le soleil (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a órbita de um cometa 
com respeito às órbitas de alguns planetas (à esquerda) e com 
respeito ao sol (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'orbita di una 
cometa riguardo alle orbite di alcuni pianeti (a sinistra) e riguardo 
al sole (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την τροχιά ενός κομήτη 
όσον αφορά τις τροχιές μερικών πλανητών (αριστερά) και όσον 
αφορά τον ήλιο (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la órbita de un cometa
con respecto a las órbitas de algunos planetas (a la izquierda) y con
respecto al sol (derecho).</string>
          </description>
